title: The Dark of the Woods: Fairy Tales for Modern Times
description: Twenty-one award-winning fantasy and science fiction writers have transformed traditional fairy tales and legends—including Snow White, Cinderella, Ali Baba, Hansel and Gretel, Rapunzel, Red Riding Hood, Sleeping Beauty, and many more—into stories that are completely original, yet still tantalizingly familiar.Discover some of the funniest, strangest, and, at times, darkest and most disturbing fairy tales you've never read.
author: Ellen Datlow
